casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 10, 2014

[Cite as 01/10/2014 Case Announcements #2, 2014-Ohio-59.]

MISCELLANEOUS ORDERS

In re Disqualification of Hunter.

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that Trade M. Hunter, Attorney Registration No. 0061225, is hereby disqualified from acting as a judge pursuant to Gov. Jud.R. III(6)(A). It is further ordered that she shall remain disqualified while any and all indictments filed in the Hamilton County Court of Common Pleas are pending and until further order of this court.
